name: Chicken Marinara Pizza

ingredients.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix or Greek Dressing Mix

preparation: Line a Sheet Pan with parchment paper. Preheat oven to 425° F.
Meanwhile, thinly slice chicken; place in Multipurpose Steamer. Stir in dressing mix. Cover and microwave on high for 3-5 min.
Place pizza shell on pan. Brush with oil; bake until crisp, 5 min.
Meanwhile, coarsely chop spinach. Cut pepper into rings. Thinly slice onion.
Remove pizza shell from oven. Spread with Marinara Sauce or Alfredo Sauce; top with chicken, veggies, and cheese.
Bake until cheese melts and edges are crispy, 5 min.
Remove from heat and let rest 2 min before slicing.
tips: Make it vegetarian by swapping meat for 1⁄2 lb cubed firm tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens with 1 tbsp prepared Balsamic Vinaigrette.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Alfredo Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Luxurious, creamy sauce for pasta, seafood, fish, and chicken.
